text: For his dinner, a glutton orders that he be served a sturgeon in haste. Except for his head, he's sick, they give him a hundred copious dishes, and they tell him, eagerly to get his things in order. "Friends", said the glutton, "you are right, and since I must die, make sure that you can serve me here without delay the rest of my life. FIN
title: El glotón
author: Jean de La Fontaine
